name: RSJ Starship
description:
HOW TO PLAY

WASD - to move the spaceshipSPACE - to activate your thrust

If you thrust certain amount of time you will reach Overdrive, which is a bullet time feature where you can more easily defend against the asteroids

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The first of a series of projects called Really Short Jam where my goal is to go deep into the journey of game design

I hope by the end of many more little projects I'll be able to develop a better game dev vision, and hope to be inspirational to some of you as well

I discover some troubles along the way and I'm really happy, I think that this kind of struggles makes you better overall so, I'm really satisfied with the process

This is a simple game that I've been working on in my free time, I would appreciate if you give me some feedback :D

Sound and Updates are coming along the way,
